page.title: 13BIBURY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school was built in 1847. Today it has 25 Junior pupils and 18 Infants. Each classroom has a computer and we also have a mathematics room and a library. We have our own cook and once a week we share our meal with Senior Citizens from the village. The school is next to the church where A service is held each term. The vicar comes to the school every week to teach us about the Bible. Every year we write our own Christmas plays which we perform for the village. We have a small playground and garden so sport activities are held at the village cricket pitch or in the garden. Each week we go swimming in Cirencester. We take part in the local country dance festival, music festival and perform at the church fete.
